## Observation notes  
First documented by Cresson, 1878a, with extensive historical record in the Pacific Maritime. Biodiversity Galiano Life List: 1987, Galiano. NBSBC Bee Atlas Database: 2021, 2022, 2023; 2022, 2023, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>.  iNaturalist: widespread throughout the Pacific Maritime, from 1978.
